website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for something simple and relatively inexpensive, this YI model does a good job.
pros: Dome light swivels and tilts to allow you to see a 360° view with this little camera
Talk-back mode allows you to talk to anyone who shows up on the camera and hear what's going on in the room
You can set 8 positions for a quick check
Can be operated through a phone app
cons: This camera isn't waterproof and may be better for an interior rather than exterior camera

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, you have to now pay a Subcription
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset with this camera as YI needs to make this more secure! Creepy voice came through the camera while my daughter was in the kitchen saying “ HEY THERE” .... I immediately emailed the vender because I have my WIFI protected and the app that I use For this camera has a pin and that did not stop someone from creeping in! Watch the video below and you will hear the loser scare my child! Also your SD card is no longer useful and they changed their policy and now you can not use the camera if you do not buy their $85 a year subscription.
customer_reviews.author: bryan cutter

customer_reviews.title: They Continually STEAL FUNDS From My Bank Account
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: They will not let me cancel my subscription and are STEALING monthly payments from my account. Paypal is useless and we are now escalating to legal action for fraud and theft. THEY COULD DO THIS TO YOU. THEY ARE THIEVES (where my account is concerned, for legal reasons, I can only report my situation, and WARN OTHERS of their DECEPTIVE PRACTICES.)
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Add dog barking alerts, cause that would be amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! We use it to keep track of our dogs during the day. The crying baby feature is nice, I was hoping it would work with dog barking, but it does not. I hope that they add that feature one day.
customer_reviews.author: GuitarSkater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent security/nursery camera
customer_reviews.text: This is really simple to install. It connects easily to the internet. The camera scans your phone and just sets its self up. Can turn on motion tracking. Excellent night vision and audio. I dont like that their is no privacy settings or I cant find any. To shut it off so it's not recording when we dont want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O'Yates

customer_reviews.title: NO IOS APP AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Yi Dome 1080 camera today - Dec 8 2017 and I cannot download the app anywhere. Tried to search on App Store for "Yi Home", scanned the QR code at the bottom of the camera, nothing. Very disappointed to say the least. Upon searching for a solution, I found lots of complaints on the Android App side for datamining / invasion of privacy. I'm wondering if Apple has shut down the app for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Works in extreme cold temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this camera. I believe I read somewhere that it wouldn’t work in cold temperatures. Well here in Alaska it recently got 25 below zero degrees Fahrenheit. The camera still functioned properly. I love it. Best security camera. I’ll only buy YI.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Ford

customer_reviews.title: Spend the little bit more extra money and get something that works...
customer_reviews.text: Motion tracking is terrible. Even with the 1080p, it is still hard to make out faces. Lots of lagging, even on a 100mbps connection speed. Not 360 degree monitoring AT ALL....Very, very disappointed. Waste of money. This was recommended to me by a friend, who only need one spot monitored (about 3ftx3ft).. does not work as an actual security camera that should detect motion. and stay locked on person. Didn't even pick up me leaving my house this morning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a Samsung HD pro the Yi and it is night and day difference. The Yi is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have 22 of these at three locations.
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture. Easy to set up and the PC app is good.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a few weeks and it worked fine but wasn't happy about all the permissions the app ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a few weeks and it worked fine but wasn't happy about all the permissions the app had. Then today a window popped up in the app forcing me to either agree to their "terms of use" and "privacy policy" or not be able to use it all. After reading through some of it I had seen enough and I'm returning it. I am only giving one star, not because of poor performance but so people will pay attention to my privacy concerns as others have voiced in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan W.

customer_reviews.title: Scary Security Issue.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this without reading the reviews. When I did, I saw that security issue of having to give access to a lot of my private information such as contacts, etc. on the app and decided to cancel my order
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, right out of the box trying to pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, right out of the box trying to pair it.... no good, doesn't respond except continuing to say waiting to connect. Try to update firmware, no good, no response. I am a pretty geeky guy, and I have a big trouble trying to set this up..... try to google for solution, none help~ maybe i got a bad pair, who know.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Liang

customer_reviews.title: Cameras will stop working requiring unplug/plug back in or stop working altogether
customer_reviews.text: The first set I purchased had one camera that would stop working after about two days requiring it to be unplugged and plugged back in so I returned them for another set. For the second set, one of the camera's motion sensors will not alert after about one month's use. Don't buy these items, they are the worst purchase I've made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckKnu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother. They were very easy to set up and have worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim LeSaux

customer_reviews.title: No notification after about 1 week. No customer support at all.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 1080 done and 1 outside camera from Yi Technology (aka Home) after being burglarized the week prior. Good hardware, except the tilt will not go down far enough (maybe 30° from horizontal?). App is ok until 1 week into it when ALL notifications stopped from ANY motion detection from ANY camera, though events are still recorded. We tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, no help. I even had my wife send them a message in Chinese since it's a Chinese base company about the issue, but still not a single word of reply. I'll be wrapping these puppies up and returning them to Amazon. Worse than horrible customer service, is no customer service at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Performance
customer_reviews.text: YI Dome Security Camera 2pc, 1080p HD Indoor Pan/Tilt/Zoom Pros-Setting camera is too easy, operation menu, image quality, installation, pan tilt, two way mic, add additional camperas those all option are excellent by the price. Cons- USB micro cable 6ft too short to install on ceiling, zoom poor quality, No Alexa interface. In conclusion by the price is excellent option
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Apple Fans - BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: The camera seems to work fine indoors or even in a covered spot outdoors even in extreme cold. The software seems to work fine for Android. I would like to use the cameras with my iPhone 8 Plus however, YI Home App for android is not for IOS and YI Home Lite works on IOS but will not record motion or take snap shots. Pretty much useless for you Apple Fans!!!! Their support tells me they are working on a fix. That was 6 plu months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year around the holidays as Christmas gifts and everyone seems to love it! My mom asked for another one for Christmas. If my little one cries it alerts my phone
customer_reviews.author: Christine A

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and only 1 was working. I still yet to sort out return/replacement for one of the units. Disappointing that i now have to go through the struggle of handling that when some simple quality control from the vendor could have avoided that
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget camera with inconsistent motion alerts
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent camera with good picture quality. The APP is fairly user-friendly and it's nice to be able to have 2-way audio. My complaint is the inconsistency in receiving motion alerts on my phone. Sometimes the alert will show shortly after motion is detected, but the majority of the time the alert is very delayed by up to an hour or even not at all. I've checked all the notification settings and motion was set to the highest sensitivity with frequent alerts. I have a new Galaxy Note 8 and the camera is connected to high-speed cable internet so there shouldn't be a problem with receiving alerts almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: RobinG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, newer version is not the same!
customer_reviews.text: They updated the lens on the camera and now it has a significant reduction in FOV... All my other cameras have approximately 20-25% more view than the newer one. I just purchased 2 that have the same new updated lens and the same issue. I adjusted all the settings possible and no help. I can see a visual difference on the old lens vs the new one. On the old version, it is exactly like pictured however on the new one the camera lens and the rings around it are flat. The new updated ones they produced are just terrible and I can not recommend enough to stay away from it
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Bad company, ok camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera does well unfortunately the company Yi gets 1 star. I have been using their service for years, but recently they turned off my cloud recording service and they have ignored all my emails to them. The audio recording quality is horrible, but the picture does well. After using this for years now it has intermittent wifi connection problems and occasionally the colors go out.
customer_reviews.author: FLS

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are worthless. They don't follow motion. Usually they will locate the motion and then go the opposite direction. It only works when in live mode. Don't bother reviewing any footage from 20 minutes ago. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great, the rotation
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, the rotation, the image super clear. What I didn’t like is that fact the app doesn’t work when u put your phone safe mode, and also I wish get notifications with any movement, the micro is low, Kids have hard time to understand me.
customer_reviews.author: Karine G. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality of older Yi Dome camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Yi Dome I purchased. First one was in white, second in black and this one in white. Right after I opened the box, I noticed the color was off. It looks old, yellowish white, which I confirmed when putting it side by side of the first one I bought. After sitting outdoor on the ceiling for at least 2 years, my old one is still noticeably whiter. Next issue is it was rather slow to connect to the network. I feel like the quality is not the same as the first 2 YI cameras I have. They've probably make some changes to reduce cost at the cost of quality. Wrong move!
customer_reviews.author: Wakart

customer_reviews.title: New update on App is awful, forget SD storage
customer_reviews.text: Have used Yi cameras for almost two years, used SD storage only. Never wanted to pay for cloud storage which is why I bought Yi cameras in the first place. But with the recent update to their app, they have made it impossible to view history saved on the SD and it basically doesn’t exist now. They are trying to force you into purchasing their cloud service. Everyone that used SD storage is getting screwed and their cameras are useless now unless they buy expensive cloud storage. The Yi camera I just bought two weeks ago is now being returned and I am switching my cameras to Wyze since they DO NOT FORCE CLOUD SERVICE TO BE PURCHASED. Bye Yi.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Noel

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy!!! They’ve taken great cameras and bricked them.
customer_reviews.text: After years of using these cameras, and recommending them to countless people, my wife pointed out to me that we can no longer see the stored videos on the micro SD cards installed in each camera. The message that now pops up says we have to subscribe to the cloud service to see the recordings stored ON THE CAMERA. If I was inclined to subscribe I wouldn’t do it because I have far too many cameras to make it affordable. I only have one choice - to remove them and search for another company. I’ll be throwing away perfectly good cameras because of this greed by the company. Highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for a low price,since it can't be installed outside we decided to install it from our front window and it's work perfectly. we disable the night vision light, because of the glare from the cristal but other than that 100% recommended,
customer_reviews.author: Ash.li

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to setup and the video was impressive. Worked great for about 6 weeks, but then the video quality started to deminish. Now at about 10 weeks, it won’t even connect to my wi-fi. I do not recommend this camera. It has turned out to just be a complete waste of my time and money. 6/23/2018 Edit: About three weeks ago I contacted Yi about my problem with this camera. I was told that since the camera has a one-year warrenty, they would replace it. I sent them the bad unit, and they shipped me a new one. It has been working great. I will update again in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Swartzie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible recording - Bad Customer support - Cheap cameras
customer_reviews.text: YI's subscription service is a joke: Company appears to limit the total amount of recording per customer so not even a 1/3rd is ever recorded of motion sensing. There is only email customer service and not very good. They rely on China for everything so wait for their response which takes weeks. The camera quality is fine to see whats going on, but facial or number place clarity is not there, not even up close. Cameras constantly 'calibrate' : They rotate to home base then return to the target.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a expensive toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought three domes. The manufacture of the cameras are acceptable. The quality of the image (even in 1080) is poor. The speed of response to the movement controls, irregular. The fluidity of the video is choppy at all times (I have 120 Mbps of internet and each camera is close to a Google WIFI). Bad sound quality (distorted, with a lot of background noise). The worst of all is the app (at least the one for IOS), review the recordings is inaccurate, difficult and tedious (especially in IOS). The general idea of ​​the system is interesting ... But not works! It is not reliable or pleasant to use. Just a expensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Vasquez Flores

customer_reviews.title: Second Yi, but issues with positioning
customer_reviews.text: The first Yi camera lasted about a year, then the picture got worse until is was just ziggy lines (and a reset didn't help). This one is good, but it insists on going all the way to the right as its "default" position. Resets, physically moving it, remote movement - none of it helped. I ended up just physically making the far right position the "correct" placement, as the wall is on the right side so it doesn't have to go any further right. The motion detection does the rest. Not ideal, but better than nothing. Let's see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: There are ads on the camera footage now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a baby camera. I need to check on my 2 young children regularly in the evening and during nap time. NOW I HAVE TO COMBAT ADS IN MY CAMERA SCREEN. This is so unprofessional. They have to get 1 Star to know this is not acceptable. If my baby is crying, I do not have time to flip through ads to get to him. This was not part of the agreement when I bought these cameras. This is a sneaky way to make even more money. How terrible. I would never recommend anyone buy these cameras; so you don’t get commercials while you’re trying to see your precious children!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I give these cameras 0 stars nothing but garbage I followed every direction to the tee at least 5 times and couldn’t get them to work. Rest cameras deleted and reinstalled app you name it I tried it. I just keep getting password error yet every other device on my network works with that password. Garbage don’t buy or you will be sending them back just like me I wasted 4 hours trying to get these cameras to work I am done
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Not able to set up after 3 hours... waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for almost THREE hours to get ONE of the two cameras I bought to work. The firmware is old (even though they were delivered today.....????) I've been stuck here trying to reformat a dang SD card for an hour now, and it all feels so wrong. Why is it that I just got it and it's already old? It shouldn't take a computer hacker to use an in home security camera. I just wanted to check on my baby while I was at work. Now I spent almost $150 for two cameras that don't work and I can't get them to work. Cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy So Far
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered two BLACK cameras...that came with WHITE cords. Seriously...why??? After plugging them in NEITHER is able to be set up. It tells me I have to download updates online, using a micro sd card and adapter that I dont have. So much for being easy. So I have two useless black cameras with tacky mismatched cords. Not cool. Finally got them set up. Still garbage. Maybe for use to check in on someone/something, but DEFINITELY not security. Doesn't catch MOST movement. Sends alerts, and then shows zero activity. And what good is SIX seconds of video?! Plus the alerts (that don't record) are delayed!! AWFUL purchase.
customer_reviews.author: serenity holden

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but motion detection not good
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to write this because I really wanted this camera. Motion detector doesn’t work that well. But also if it is detecting motion then I assumed it would follow the motion. Instead it “might” detect and then turns 90 in the other direction. Set up instructions are extremely easy but the actual set up is annoying when the camera doesn’t read the bar info... just keep very still and it will work. Night detection is good enough. I wouldn’t really buy another one but this is ok for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SupremeFawn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely needs some updates!
customer_reviews.text: The video playback freezes when it switches from infrared to the normal camera. Also, the playback software on video is a bit annoying. They should design it to be more like video playback on a phone, DVD player, or YouTube. But it is difficult to get exact timestamps, & there is no fast forward, rewind, pause/play features.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Francois

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I purchased this. 1st one worked for a year then didn't work anymore. The second one only lasted 10 months. I asked technical support but they were not much help.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK WITHOUT CLOUD SUBSCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older version of the same camera with this and discovered a fun upgrade: you don't get to watch more than 10 seconds of motion alerts unless you subscribe to the cloud. Put in a memory card, you say? Done. And guess what? It doesn't matter! Old model would record motion until the motion stopped, send you an alert and let you watch the entire recording. This one (apparently) records motion until it stops and sends an alert but prevents you from watching the full recording. What's the point of a motion detector if it won't show me what happens? Total garbage, returned it and have to find something else now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is beyond disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two dome cameras, and they work great, but!😈Paid up to Dec 10, 2019 for Yi cloud! Yi deleted my cloud service and after 7 phone calls and repeatedly sending snapshots of proof of payment and order # for purchase of Yi cloud! This is going on a month! Every time you call nobody has a record of your previous calls! It’s so obvious it’s a scam! There is an order number and copies of paid receipts, completely disregarded ! To much aggravation! They must make a lot of money dancing people around! Bad taste in my mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Happy in East Rockaway

customer_reviews.title: YI Home Cameras effective. Home surveilance.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. The quality is good picture quality is fine until you zoom then the 1080p drops significantly. Pretty good range on wifi i have 2 cams mounted outside the house and signal is decent considering the barriers my router is down stairs.Great value for the money aoftware updates come fairly often that adds features to the app software works with Alexa has away mode that sends notifications if camera detects motion or sounds alarm for audio alerts.Awesome value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: tscrp30

customer_reviews.title: Can and will be hacked
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself has a good picture and micrphone. However, YI went with the terrible design decision of not letting this camera work without internet / cloud access. My camera was hacked within a few minutes of it being plugged in. Normally the solution is to disallow internet access to the camera. This will cause the camera to NOT work at all though. Do not buy if you value any privacy. There are too many other options that allow for a good quality camera without sacrificing your privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be configured for stand alone operation without the phone application
customer_reviews.text: You might enjoy this product. I'm sending mine back because it requires downloading a phone application with potential loss of privacy privileges. The product should be supplied such that it records to SD by default (stand alone mode) or to the Cloud (with a monthly fee of course). The phone app should be an optional feature, not a forced one. I want my home as well as my privacy to be secure.
customer_reviews.author: E. McCauley

customer_reviews.title: 1 year warranty because they will die after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this isn't 1 star is because it actually worked for a year and did what it was supposed to do (I had it at 4 stars previous since the picture quality wasn't great for an HD camera and the noises it made were a bit much). No surges as it was on a UPS, but a little after 1 year it would no longer connect to the Wi-Fi and due to that was useless. This is not a reliable long term purchase. Will be acceptable if you only need it for a short time, but expect it to break after a year.
customer_reviews.author: GuyfromDarth

customer_reviews.title: They are just okay...
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection is hit or miss.... 1) there is a huge delay from real time to the alert. 2) it will alert when a leaf falls on the porch steps but not when a deliveryman walks up and leaves a package. (Camera is inside facing out the porch window) 3) it will randomly turn itself to night vision in the middle of the day and adjust its brightness, causing "false" motion alerts. We bought this set of 2 after having one for over a year with minimal issues, but jlhave had these two new camera installed for less than a week and have already found numerous issues. Great if you aren't too concerned about real time alerts/movements or consistent/accurate detection.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the product. There have been minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately two cameras failed for different reasons within a weeks time. We do however have five 1080p indoor cameras which have never given us any problems. And three outdoor cameras. One replaced once because they are NOT waterproof! You need to protect them from the rain. Other than that they’re a great camera for the price. You don’t need the cloud service. I’ve seen slot of complaints about that. Just insert a micro sd card and it will record any motion. We only use the cards in the outdoor cameras and when something trips them I get a activity alert sent to my phone. Easy to set up only takes five minutes and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & versatile camera...
customer_reviews.text: For the last two years have been using stationary YI Cams outside the house. Received this one last week, installed and played with it for several hours. The device is excellent regarding communication, video and audio as well. The fact that can be installed inverted, makes it more attractive. Was able to verify in the computer that all the video/audio clips can be downloaded in the computer and keep those tracks relevant for future use. Excellent device for the money!
customer_reviews.author: M in Florida

customer_reviews.title: No iOS support in USA
customer_reviews.text: as of 12/7/2017 there is no iOS (apple iphone) application on the apple store - and while there is a PC application, you can't set the camera up with the PC. Makes you wonder why Amazon sells this in the USA? Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy

customer_reviews.title: Constantly going off line
customer_reviews.text: At first this is a good camera. I don't have a subscription and only use it with the app since I don't need to have archived video's of what's going on. I got it to watch over my dad since he has Alzheimer's. Over the last month the camera keeps going off line and I have to reset it. It is very frustrating when I need to check on him when gone from the house and I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Changed "rules" after purchase
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased these cameras they recorded to the SD card and I was able to record constantly and I was happy with that. At some point Yi apparently decided that it would no longer support that and if I want to continue to use these cameras for their intended purposes I need to subscribe to their storage plan costing me even more money. This doesn't seem legal. If anyone starts a class action count me in.
customer_reviews.author: MasesMom

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent and honest
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not compatible with Apples IPhone, per customer Service. Wish they would stop selling it until they get the Apple App up and running! Customer service is excellent and honest. Dec 7, 12:51 PST Our development team is working with Apple to resolve the issue and hope to get the app back up and running as quickly as possible. We will continue to update you when we get more information. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Best Regards, YI Technical Support
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: No help from YI Cameras during theft
customer_reviews.text: The alerts for certain cameras stopped working about a month ago and YI would not tell me why. Somebody stole packages from my front steps. Because YI disabled the alerts for that particular camera, I have no video of the theft. YI expects me to watch the live feed of all cameras while I'm at work. Ridiculous that they cut off alerts for certain cameras - without an explanation just before I got robbed. There is also very limited phone support. 8-4 Monday through Friday. Ya, when most of the world is at work. And there is no weekend support. Regret buying 5 cameras from them.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for privacy policy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these cameras and they work fine. The problem is that Yi made changes to their privacy policy. I find the terms unacceptable. You must agree to their new policy or they make the cameras essentially unusable by disabling the app. I have invested in 3 cameras that are now useless to me. I regret purchasing Yi cameras.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: WORKs better than expected
customer_reviews.text: QR tags are utilized for software install, setup and FAQ. A little detective work, passwords and account setup is required to get things communicating. WIFI use is free no cost prefered configyre but for additional cost a YIcloud service can be used at additional monthly cost. Otherwise, if you have free WIFI at a remote location, all works smoothly. I was impressed for the money, the quality, AI and optional features are nicely included.thanks for another great tech product, jerzil
customer_reviews.author: jerzil

customer_reviews.title: UNREALABLE Failed to record movement
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera as my baby cam and found that the camera missing and has delayed images. I had a nanny come watch my son at night and I was using the camera to monitor my sons nursery live, and the camera failed caputure what was going on in the room. The camera is constantly “loading” and saying I have bad connectivity. But I pay extra for high speed internet and have excellent connectivity, so I know that my internet definitively not the issue. Even when I adjust the settings and sensitivity, the results were still the same.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible mount, poor range of motion
customer_reviews.text: This camera is pretty easy to set up and use. The app works well. It consistently has trouble with staying connected to my router when nothing else in the house has any problem. The plastic twist mount is a joke; why does this not have a standard screw mount??? The little plastic fins on the mounting bracket broke immediately when I was trying to install it. Now the camera has to sit on a shelf and it doesn’t rotate low enough to capture anything below the level of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Draislin

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I now have four of these Dome cameras and one of the outdoor cameras from this company. All have been pretty reliable. One of them has even been knocked over a few times by my retarded cat and continues to work perfectly. I wish I didn't need all these cameras but packages are regularly stolen off of my doorstep because delivery people don't know how to read and follow instructions LOL. The cloud storage that the offer is honestly pretty overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Khellendrose

customer_reviews.title: No recorded video without subscription
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for more than 2 years and was always able to see video of alerts when cat moved around or timed lights went on or off. Just went away for 2 days and only received 2 alerts which only showed 6 seconds of no movement. Message says I must subscribe to cloud service to see more. I have a 32GB card that showed 0.5GB left so I reformatted. Restarted and still no alert video. So much for looping. I will not subscribe to a Chinese cloud service so perfectly fine camera may be done.
customer_reviews.author: KrankyKoot

customer_reviews.title: Look for something better
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/1/2020: playback functionality from SD card is not working properly, Yi needs to get it together , they keep trying sell you cloud services!! This camera for some reason reboots and unlinks from app, you have to reset and set up, keeps happening every now and then. Wont buy it again, purchased as a gift now its a pain to have to set it up every time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about putting this outside in Utah. I realized someone could take the item with the USB drive inside, and take the evidence. I will need another camera for outside. I was hoping I could view the image online. I have not figured out how, but I just bought the camera. I would like to be able to talk to someone on this. I don't see any difference with night vision outside, but there are street lights. The item moves around by the controls on my phone, and I can see images far away. I don't see any
customer_reviews.author: Pet lover

customer_reviews.title: AVOID PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This company charged for surveillance, a whole year of subscription and all of a sudden I cannot see cloud recordings. They are asking for proof of payment and other information even after several emails I've sent showing the app with the Active Cloud Recording with the amount paid, order number and subscription period. Support is China based and it is extremely difficult if not impossible to have them sort out this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emi Lahrssen

customer_reviews.title: My family loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera to add to our existing yi indoor cameras but this is the first motion detection and ptz camera that we have. We mounted this on our ceiling to monitor our son and pets during the day. The camera is able to accurately follow movement inside our house which we really like. There was also an accident that happened inside the house and the camera was able to catch it because of the motion detection. Im glad i got this camera for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty camera design x 2
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera, but it began to pixelate after 2 months. Amazon attempted to help, but this appears to be a defective piece. Amazon said they will contact the manufacturer to see how to resolve the issues, but no word from YI. Update: purchased a second camera and it also failed within 60 days and outside the return window. Great idea especially the tracking feature, but it will be added to the electronic recycle bin with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera for this price!
customer_reviews.text: Are there better cameras? Sure - but you get a lot of bang for your buck with this one! It has a great 360 range and shows daytime brightness very well. I did notice a clicking one day and thought one of the cats messed with it. Turns out that when it switches to and from night mode - it will click for a minute. So nothing damaged. :) Also of every Wifi device I own - this was hands down the simplest setup. Done in seconds. Will purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Connection errors NEVER stopped.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on it for 2 hours , it will not connect to my wifi .I spent two hours trying to connect this thing to my WIFY network. This is not my first rodeo with a WIFY security cam. I know the pitfalls about passwords and 5g incompatibility. I've connected other WIFY devices in a matter of minutes, not having to waste precious hours with no success. This device simply will NOT connect wirelessly. It will connect wired but then the next problem. The PC camera software is not intuitive or particularly helpful. It will not display what the camera sees.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: App experience makes system unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The app is inconsistent. WiFi drops often. App often loses cameras causing re-setup. Viewing SD video history went from ok to unusable with last upgrade. The price of camera is great, easy setup, cameras work well but the apps poor performance is causing me to buy another system from Wyze.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value with many features
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased four of these cameras for various locations. The camera is excellent and the first one I purchased is still going strong now for over two years. I would suggest that you look into purchasing a longer USB cable so you have the flexibility for the power supply especially if you are mounting on the ceiling. Also, know that this like any other camera has the potential to be hacked so you should mount this is an area that will not compromise personal information.
customer_reviews.author: Samuele M. Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: likes to get stuck
customer_reviews.text: it's better than most I have tried, yet the captures are very very very short and so it's worse in that regard. I would much rather have longer captures since if it comes to the point of needing evidence you won't have it. It also needs more features. Amcrest was far better even thought their software was horrible, now I have half way decent software, much much quieter cam but no flexibility. Unfortunately it takes a while to figure all this out and since we only get 30 days I'm stuck with the other unit.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRider

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Nice pictures on both daytime (color) and night vision, but the camera wouldn't stay connected to my network. Also, the pan and tilt was hard to manipulate due to a large delay between input and movement. Setting up to connect to WiFi was easy, but, like I said, I never got it to stay connected. Sending it back...
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Constantly having connectivity problems
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this camera bought back in late 2017 and I have had to delete and add the camera at least once a month over the past year because the app doesn’t want to connect to turn off or on all I get is a message saying problems connecting try again later. I have my own private network no one else is it and I get that message there’s even times that I can’t add the camera after deleting it because the camera won’t connect to the app. In my opinion look for something else that might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Security Risk
customer_reviews.text: This camera can ONLY be used with the manufacturer's software. You will have no way of controlling who sees the video. It also does NOT have a web interface so you can NOT configure it via a browser. Because of that, even after you find its local IP address, you have no way of knowing what port this camera is using. Thus, you can NOT use port-forwarding to regulate external access. However, all this is mute because you are forced to use the manufacturer's lame software. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tickle

customer_reviews.title: So close to being good
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these products, not because I bought them but because I had the first one replaced. The first one would not connect to my WiFi anymore so they reluctantly sent me a new one. Worked great for a while... and now it randomly freezes the image on a black and white blurry smudge and won't work unless I manually reset the power on it. Ah! and again it's having problems connecting to the WiFi. This could've been a great product, but the constant problems and very, very poor support, makes this product a real missed opportunity for Yi.
customer_reviews.author: D@N

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this cam.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of in-house cameras and this is the best. I have 4 YI units in 4 different rooms, guarding 4 doors leading into my house. I also have 8 exterior cameras at the perimeter of my home. But these fit in my pocket called a cell phone, anywhere away from home I can check each camera. On thing I dislike, it seems all the other brands are capitable with Blue Iris software that is a big plus. For the YI Techs, can you come up with something between YI and Blue Iris and allow the two to guard our homes. Recommend this Camera for the cellphone, but I think we can do better. Robt.
customer_reviews.author: Robt.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cameras!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 Yi cameras, 2 are the dome type. I actually have them all outside even though they are indoor, in protected areas. The only thing I wish the dome cameras, had that the other Yi cameras have is being able to set the area for motion alerts. I previously used their cloud service, but switched all my cameras over to 64 GB SD cards and set the cameras to record 24/7. I get about 3 days on a card before it starts to record over content. Great product for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Schmoop

customer_reviews.title: App updates causing problems
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but once they started updating the APP its hasn't worked the same. Half the features are intermittent at best if you can even get to them. Worst network ever. Limited access. Alerts never work properly. Originally gave a 2 star but the app keeps getting worse. I would give 0 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J Blatt

customer_reviews.title: Works ok when you get a good one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One works fine. The other, not so much. It keeps connecting to 25% and just stuck there. I have reset it several times. Same thing happens after awhile. I even switched the two, thinking it might be location based due to wifi strength. Nope. The one that has issue always does. The one that works, give me multiple alerts a day. Even when I changed the sensitivity to low and frequency to low? And when I watch the video, nothing in the house is moving. Just the camera itself doing its auto-cruise. I wonder if I have ghost in my house? In that case, splendid motion detection.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chu

customer_reviews.title: More Money, Less Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cheaper set of these cameras (not the dome) and loved them. I though having ones that rotate would be better, since they were more expensive, to use in the front of my house. I was wrong. The picture quality is terrible. I ended up moving my cheaper pair to the location I hoped to use these. They seem to be trying to focus all the time resulting in not a lot of video being recorded on the card. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought another brand of camera.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great idea, and I use it every day, but it sounds like a party in my sons room every night just because the sound is way so sensitive that the air makes so much noise. I can’t change the alerts over the app, so it makes the same sound as an email. I have to leave the app open all night, so I don’t sleep through the alerts, and it drains my phone’s battery. Also, the alerts are sometimes instant, but sometimes up to 20 minutes late frequently. Over all, it’s a life saver, but if my son could open his door, he would be outside by the time I got the alert on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cclark.7059

customer_reviews.title: They sent me and obviously refurbished camera.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed eight of these for different customers, I’ve recommended them to my customers, one thing I didn’t recommend to my customers was And obviously refurbished camera. The housing on this camera is two different colors, white, and off-white it’s quite noticeable. Depending on what you all do, will determine whether or not I suggest your cameras to more customers, and purchase more and install them for people. I did not pay for a refurbished camera with used parts, this is quite ridiculous and very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Defee

customer_reviews.title: No No No...
customer_reviews.text: These cameras were awesome at one time...no more. If you only want to sit and watch live stream, its great. If you want it to view video and pics when motion is detected, BUY SOMETHING ELSE!!! This company now forces you to pay to view what use to be free with an SD card. Shame on you YI.
customer_reviews.author: laura b

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Doesn’t have storage, you have to buy the cloud storage for it. We tried the month trial, and it was good. Although it interfered with our tv antenna reception so had to be unplugged (that was just bc the two needed to be the same window). Also it takes a while for it to load when you’re scrolling through saved data in the cloud storage... and you can’t really see while scrolling, so looking for a specific event is time consuming. I liked the notifications to my phone, but got them every time the wind blew which was annoying..
customer_reviews.author: Sbirk

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this price for the product! I had spent over 600 on the wireless Arlo cameras and they sucked. I wanted cameras that worked and didn’t want to spend a lot more money so I got the YI camera. I love it so much. I don’t love the app because you can’t do scrub control over the videos on the cloud. I think they should really fix this. If you Want to go back and watch the footage you have to watch it in real time or move the play head and wait for it to load. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Fhockey28

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks back and forth with the seller and still not activated. Sadly, returning.  Made well but unable to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to keep this, but after two weeks back and forth with seller, I still can't get activated. They are also on a different time zone, which means they answer questions while I am asleep. As far as the workmanship, it's first class. But it's not much good if I can't get activated. I really wanted to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Young

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable cameras and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Ive got at least six Yi cameras a few PTZ and a few standard fixed cameras. Setup is easy and the app is great at walking you through it all. One area i did have hiccups on was interference where even though the signal was shown as excellent to strong, it would drop while live viewing. After months of dealing with it, a simple ferrite core cover over tue usb cable solved it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a few months, then everything started to suck...
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up, and this actually worked pretty well for the first few months that I had it. Nothing was damaged at all, but for some reason the app became very difficult to connect while not on Wi-Fi. Also, the remote control is very jittery and the camera almost daily gets stuck completely turned around pointing at the wall during motion detection. In a nutshell, search elsewhere. Camera is quite expensive compared to others and there must be better options. I'm certainly searching for one. Definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SteelersFan86

customer_reviews.title: I plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The app works great and the features all work as they should. Yes there are less expensive camera systems on Amazon, but their mobile apps aren't as polished as Yi's. I use this to monitor my dogs when I'm at work. The 2 way audio is amazing, although I don't use it anymore with the dogs because it caused them to bark at the camera for several hours while I was at work. I've paired mine with the green 32gb Samsung sd card that Amazon recommended and haven't had any problems with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Junk...
customer_reviews.text: Wow... Initially I had given this product a five star rating because it was so easy to set up and it worked so efficiently. As of today, officially 15 days later, the product no longer works and will no longer connect to Wi-Fi even after troubleshooting it and reconfiguring the firmware and hardware on my phone, this was not an easy task by any stretch of the imagination and the product still does not work. Absolute waste of money and time! Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Subscription left me feeling ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I'm frustrated with this camera as this was my second one. When I went to set it up the set up stated that in order to use this feature (2 cameras) I had to pay a $15 per month subscription. Now too late to return. I'm feeling ripped-off.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Girl

customer_reviews.title: we have 4 of these cameras
customer_reviews.text: These cameras were inexpensive and keep track of our house and our mother's house while traveling. (good for watching elderly people too.) Doesn't always capture images when scanning as it does not move toward the image and may be out of range at that point in time. for the price, a decent camera, a good starter camera for your house. works well on wifi.. tech dept was very helpful when we had problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: There's an issue with the app on those cameras the alerts keep going off even after I delete them I get four alerts all day long for the same thing it's very annoying no matter how much I set it to home it still goes off I keep setting the settings to all products and only human movement and it goes right back to the way it was repeatedly.very annoying! Also it tends to go back to home when I'm outside by itself
customer_reviews.author: Terry Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Awful awful camera
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great during the day but at night it is crap. Very pixelated and distorted when zoomed. And the sound sucks. Don’t pick up half of what is going on and the lag is awful. There is a 2-4 sec lag on sound and the controlling the camera is a joke cause it won’t move or moves too much. I don’t recommend this camera at all. Not to mention you can not have it linked to more than one device at a time.
customer_reviews.author: B.Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Very slow, could not watch live feed
customer_reviews.text: This camera did not work for us. The video would take so long to load and would display old images of what was no longer live. We wanted this to be able to watch a live video when we were not home but this camera did not work for that since it could not display a live video. We have fast wireless internet and the camera was near the source of the internet, but would not give live video.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good camera, especially for the price. The two way audio works pretty well and it seems pretty well built for an inside camera. The picture is very good in good lighting and decent in low light/night. My only cons for this system is the app is a little laggy in that when you move the camera it take a second to register, so it takes some practice to move it how you want. Also if you set the camera up as a stand up on say a self or something, you cannot tilt the camera down past straight horizontal
customer_reviews.author: Charon

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This thing never worked right from the get go, it doesnt even tilt. You can hear and feel the motor trying, but it just wont do it. I ordered it back in October, but havent used it until now. I expected a lot more from a customer service department of a reputable company, then again, who the hell has heard of YI Technologies, maybe not so reputable. Anyways, its outside Amazons 30 day return window, and the company darn near wants your social security number, a blood and urine, and DNA sample to work with you. Luckily I found my reciept and theyll be fixing it for free...
customer_reviews.author: Conorpro

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first few weeks, then completely useless after that
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago and at first was fairly pleased with it.. but now it's acting up and its past the warranty period. I reset it and did everything i could without taking it apart to get it back to normal.. No luck.. The picture is now fuzzy, I set it for motion detection recording so now it's recording all the time because the picture gets lines and blurs and it records that. I was hoping it was better quality for the price but in the end I got what i paid for, cheap Chinese crap.
customer_reviews.author: 808surfer

customer_reviews.title: YI support will not respond if you have issues.
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked fine for 2 weeks then the sound and mic stopped working. Attempted to contact YI for support or warranty. Ended up sending Yi two emails with no response other than the automated acknowledgment email. The image quality is good and the app works fine. I would not recommend this company simply due to YI not providing the slightest amount of support. Buy from companies that will stand behind their products. (FYI) Amazon made it right by replacing the defective camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how anyone uses this camera. I can't even down load the app because I have to change the App Store to China, and to do that I need a China address. It is very sad Amazon allows this product to be sold here in the US. When it doesn't work for the US VERSION. I will be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Holler it's pauler

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money. 1 of 2 cameras I bought quit working 3 mo in. There is no tech support.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my mother and 1 quit working after about 3 months. Just has a purple digitized screen. Can't return or exchange it and cant reach the help support people thru the app. So basically you have a 50/50 chance of getting one that will keep working based on my experience. The market is flooded with cheap knockoff junk and this is one!!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Phillips

customer_reviews.title: like the functionalities, but the quality is a good issue, even worse it has only 30 day warranty , ouch!
customer_reviews.text: so far it works fine, like the features and price, also bought a 3rd party warranty for 4 additional years, will wait and see how long it will last. It died miserable today, first it had no response. So I have to delete the camera from app, then try to add back in, after successful connecting to wifi, it failed to pair, tried multiple time, even downloaded the latest firmware for this camera, it does not fix this problem. I ordered this camera in Mar 2017, today is Dec 10,2017, $75 bugs down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Yu

product_meta.title: YI Dome Security Camera 1080p HD Pan/Tilt/Zoom 2.4G IP Surveillance System, 24/7 Emergency Response, Auto-Cruise, Motion Track, Night Vision, iOS/Android App - Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
product_meta.description:
Size:Camera 1 pc| Color:BlackSetting Up Your Camera With YI Home App
1.Install YI Home App and create a YI Home Account
2.Turn your camera on and select the '+' icon in YI Home App to add your camera
3.Select your Wi-Fi network and enter your Wi-Fi password, then select Connect to Wi-Fi
4.Scan the QR Code shown on the app, then select Next once the QR Code has scanned
5.Select Save, then select Start using to finish pairing
6.If connection failed, please push the Reset button and try again

WiFi Settings
1.YI Home cameras will need to connect to a 2.4GHz band network. 5GHz WiFi band is not supported
2.Turning on the location service on the phone if you encounter Unknown SSID issue
3.Encryption mode must be set to WPA/WPA2 (mixed mode) or WPA2
4.Your Wi-Fi password must be 8-20 characters in length
If you have any other problem, please contact us via support@yitechnology.com.
feature_bullets: 1080p High-definition, wide-angle advanced glass lens combined with 345° horizontal & 115° vertical rotation range create a complete 360° coverage. Advanced night vision with 8 built-in 940nm infrared LED beads extend the viewing distance to 3 meters in pitch dark with no light pollution, so your pet will not be disturbed by LED glare.

Optional 24/7 Emergency Response Service is just $4.99/month - YI’s motion alerts and live video feeds are now equipped with the option to instantly involve Noonlight’s Certified Emergency Dispatchers, who coordinate with police, fire, and EMS agencies on customers’ behalf to ensure the situation is promptly handled.

YI Dome integrates with your YI Home family in one simple interface. User-friendly and intuitive app to customize your settings: activity alerts, auto-cruise, bookmarks, camera sharing, customize schedules, and more. Supports connectivity to a large number of devices with the same app/account for maximum convenience. Available for iOS and Android. (Only products sold by the seller YI Technology come with one-year warranty)

Receive real-time Activity Alerts while you're out. 10-sec motion tracking records and centers the moving object. Bookmark your favorite positions (up to 8) and return to them at the tap of a button. Select Auto-Cruise to survey the area 360° horizontally or cruise your bookmarks, suitable for large areas that need a quick scan (and tracks moving objects).

Supports YI Cloud to avoid the risk of losing footage from a SD card, ensure all your videos are safe and protected. We provide the most efficient compression and the highest protection of data, so you can be sure that your footage is secure. Reliable Wi-Fi connectivity to access your camera with YI Home App on mobile device, and YI Home App on PC* at anytime, anywhere. Built-in support for 802.11b/g/n 2.4Ghz (5Ghz currently not supported) Wi-Fi band. *PC App is for viewing only

YI Home App - Acess your camera with our mobile APP anytime and anywhere, more flexible with Home/Away mode. Allows sharing your camera with up to 5 family members or friends, and view multiple cameras on a single account. 9 live feeds on pc app is available now.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars9,537 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
